Then, launch the software and connect both of your phones to the computer via USB cables. The software will detect your phones and display them on the screen.
 
Next, you need to select the data types that you want to transfer from the source phone to the destination phone. You can also choose to clear the data on the destination phone before transferring. Then, click on "Start Transfer" and wait for the process to complete.
